name: Sea Realm Reverie
description:
In "Sea Realm Reverie" you play as Umiko who lives in a world where water bubbles are all over the sky.

As Umiko you can swim, jump and glide. Though there is a restriction to it.

There are 3 (long) levels you can play through each with different obstacles and increasing difficulty.  For you first play through, you probably need around 20-40 minutes.

This is my third game done (though my first I uploaded here) as a 26 years old game developer student from Germany. It's made with unreal, and I made everything by myself except the sounds. I didn't record them (they are from https://www.weloveindies.com/) but I mixed them to something very distinct that fits my game more.

Feedback or opinions about the game are very welcome.

Have fun diving into Sea Realm Reverie!
